content: Good for you!! This realization is a big deal that many never figure out. — — To me it’s similar to those lotto winners that end up broke in no time. If you ‘suck’ at financial stuff, having more money does not change that fact. — — If you don’t know how to love yourself (and how important it is) how can you ever really be successful in love with another? — — GOOD FOR YOU!!! ❤ ❤
